links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (27,-245,813,-594).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / ((1 - x) (1 - 6 x) (1 - 9 x) (1 - 11 x)), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 16 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) m:=25; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/((1-x)*(1-6*x)*(1-9*x)*(1-11*x)))); /* or */ I:=[1,27,484,7266]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 27*Self(n-1)-245*Self(n-2)+813*Self(n-3)-594*Self(n-4): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 16 2013(PARI) a(n) = (12*11^(n+3) - 25*9^(n+3) + 16*6^(n+3) - 3)/1200; \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 13 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
